result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lashawn Arthur Davis Jr

defendant.name: Davis, Lashawn Arthur, Jr
defendant.address: 5228 North Lovers Lane Road #4, Milwaukee, WI 53225

records.addlTxt: Signed and filed: Order for Competency Examination (Outpatient)
Received and Filed: Proposed Order for Competency Examination (Outpatient)

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis Jr in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court for Lashawn Arthur Davis Jr.  Attorney Gerald Henry Alder in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  However, Defense raises competency.  Court ordered outpatient competency examination.  Competency examination will be conducted by Doctor Jenna Niess on October 25, 2022 at 9:00 AM in Rm 504 of the Safety Building.  Order for Competency signed and filed by the Court.  Case adjourned for a Doctor's Report Return in Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 10-03-2022

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis Jr in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court for Lashawn Arthur Davis Jr.  Attorney Gerald Henry Alder in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense advises of why defendant missed court date. Court vacates stayed bench warrant. Defense requests plea and sentencing. Case adjourned in Branch 2.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defendant failing to appear.  Defense counsel requests that the Court impose and stay a warrant.  State has no objection. Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense counsel and defendant appear via Zoom. Defense requests a plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 room G55 CJF.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
JusticePoint Supervision Report dated May 31, 2022 - received
Pretrial Services Status Report

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis in court.  Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg via zoom.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for status conference.  The Status conference was held.  Defense has received discovery and requesting an additional status conference date.  The Court order the matter adjourned back to Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Pretrial Services Status Report

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis in court with Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer M. Sheremeta. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report

Court ordered no contact with MA; HE
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Defendant Lashawn Arthur Davis in custody.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Lashawn Arthur Davis appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
